attributes.action: Impose a nationwide quarentine to control the new varient of COVID19!
attributes.additional_details: As evidence shown in Spain, France and Italy if the whole country was put in quarantine with schools closed and not exercise outdoors allowed the hospitals were not overwhelmed as we are seeing here in the UK especially in London and the South East of England where the number of cases and deaths are at the highest.
attributes.background: Impose a full national quarentine including the full closure of schools including the borders and copy what Spain did in the first wave and not allow people out for any form of exercise to try and keep the NHS from being overwhelmed and creating more of devastating crisis and more cases and deaths
